title: Strengthening Patient Care Practical Competencies: Collaborative Autoethnographic Inquiry for Online Mathematics Education

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and document the physical/social limitations of online mathematics learning using the CAE methodology
Learners can create digital portfolios of collaborative problem-solving processes in a VR simulation environment
Learners can recognize time management issues arising in online learning processes and propose improvement strategies

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
